name: Divine Business: Fantasy Trading Simulator
description: Divine Business - is that side of religion that no one ever think about. Why gods prefer to help ones and forsake others? What goal do they follow? Its time to take a look at this process from the place of god by yourself.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: 1.5ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics or analogue Storage: 300 MB available space
